name: FiftiesEnough
description:
You can also use web_version

Made from scratch using  Blender, Unity and BFXr, for TriJam

developed by ALAMURIT instagram

*******************Instructions********************
  1. Objective of this game is to survive for most of the time  
  2. You have 3 indicators 
    1. Life
    2. Catalyst
    3. Survival duration
  3.  You need to maintain catalyst amount to fifty {50} only
  4. If it is(catalyst) less than 50, your life will decrease with time and you will slow down
  5. If it is(catalyst) more than 50, your life will decrease with time and you will move faster*
  6. You can notice the change in catalyst amount through the color of player
*******************CONTROLS*******************
  • A, D to move left and right
  • w to jump
Soundtrack by

Hydra by Huma-Huma

https://creativecommons.org/licenses/...) Source: http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-... Artist: http://incompetech.com/
